roleset.name: living in poverty
roleset.note: POOR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from poor.01-j)
POORER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from poorer.01-j)

example.name: poor-j: arg1, CXN
example.text: Poor people sometimes have bad credit before they hit adulthood , due to *PRO* being too poor to keep up with the high cost of living . So they never get a fair chance .
example.arg: [too][to keep up with the high cost of living]

example.name: poor-j: both args
example.text: the food was poor in nutritive value

roleset.name: inadequate, unskilled performance
roleset.note: POOR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet, FrameNet (from poor.02-j)

example.name: poor-j: both args
example.text: Superior mesenteric artery Doppler is poor at predicting feed intolerance and NEC in preterm small for gestational age neonates.
example.arg: at predicting feed intolerance and NEC in preterm small for gestational age neonates

example.name: poor-j: arg2
example.text: Print quality is poor at the edges of the page.
example.arg: at the edges of the page

example.name: poor-j
example.text: I 've kind of been giving poor Darren Lee and the MABRC a break
